description:
Designed with the help of Conrad Anker, these approach socks use a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy on the way to your vertical adventure. An Achilles strap protects your ankles from rocks and other trail debris.

  • Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane
  • 4-Degree™ Elite Fit System uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Indestructawool™ Technology in high-impact areas for comfort
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
  • Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet
name: Smartwool Athlete Edition Approach Crew Socks - Women's
